mutants.code:
def derangement(n):
    mod = 10 ** 9 - 7
    der = [0, 0] + [0] * n
    der[0] = 1
    der[1] = 0
    der[2] = 1
    for i in range(3, n + 1):
        der[i] = (i - 1) * (der[i - 1] + der[i - 2]) % mod
    return der[n]

        der[i] = (i - 1) * (der[i - 1] + der[i - 2]) % mod
    return der[n]
